name: biobb_pytorch ApplyMDAE
title: Apply a Molecular Dynamics AutoEncoder (MDAE) PyTorch model.
description: Apply a Molecular Dynamics AutoEncoder (MDAE) PyTorch model; the resulting denoised molecular dynamics or reduced dimensionality of molecular dynamics data can be used to analyze the dynamic properties of the system.

input_data_npy_path.description: Path to the input data file.

file_formats.description: Path to the input data file

input_model_pth_path.description: Path to the input model file.

file_formats.description: Path to the input model file

output_reconstructed_data_npy_path.description: Path to the output reconstructed data file.

file_formats.description: Path to the output reconstructed data file

output_latent_space_npy_path.description: Path to the reduced dimensionality file.

file_formats.description: Path to the reduced dimensionality file

latent_dimensions.description: Dimensionality of the latent space used for encoding.

num_layers.description: Number of layers in the encoder/decoder (4 to encode and 4 to decode).

input_dimensions.description: Input dimensionality; by default it should match the number of features in the input data (number of atoms × 3 for x, y, z coordinates).

output_dimensions.description: Output dimensionality; by default it should match the number of features in the input data (number of atoms × 3 for x, y, z coordinates).
